name: OpusCanvas
0:
”Alexa, ask opus canvas to turn off opus”
”Alexa, ask opus canvas to brighten opus to fifty percent”
”Alexa, ask opus canvas to show next on opus”

Invocation Name: opus canvas
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Meural Opus is a Wi-Fi connected digital Canvas allowing for display artworks from the Meural platform. It is required to obtain the Meural Opus, register the device under your Meural account and connect it to a network. Then, enable the Meural Opus skill for Amazon Alexa, login with your Meural credentials, and discover you devices. Now, you can control your Meural Opus with the following options:
- To turn on your Meural Opus, say: "Alexa, turn on opus"
- To turn off your Meural Opus, say: "Alexa, turn off opus" 
- Set brightness of the screen, say: "Alexa, brighten opus to fifty percent"
- To show next image, say: "Alexa, next on opus" or "Alexa, ask opus canvas to show next image on opus"
- To show previous image, say: "Alexa, previous on opus" or "Alexa, ask opus canvas to show previous image on opus"
